rollDice.usage: roll a specified number of dice, with each dice having a specified number of sides

poll.usage: make a poll with a specified question

pfp.usage: get the profile picture (pfp) of user_for_avatar or the user who requested

kick.usage: kick <user> if the person running the command has the correct permissions

ban.usage: ban <user> if the person running the command has the correct permissions

kraken.usage: print "I am the one, the only kraken"

help.usage: print this help message. for developers, the help message is defined in help.json.
